title: This review is negative enough that I�m sure they�ll do that thing where they use my last name in the reply in an effort
cons: The staff. Where do I start? The guy who checked me in immediately assumed that I had gone over my credit limit on my card, to my face (when I was in the middle of explaining to him that my credit card company was having persistent issues with automatically classifying transactions as fraud). Rude and embarrassing. Then the card that was in my room when I got there had the wrong name written on it. They also apparently had a glitch where the system would tell them that my room was set to �do not disturb� when I never once did this. So any time I needed something cleaned, I actually just had to ask, and to their credit, it would get done, but sometimes long after it was needed. The doormen tried to put another guest into a cab I had called for myself (which would have been an understandable mistake, had I not been standing there longer than that guy without even being approached by anyone). I know this is a new property, but in my opinion, there is no excuse for putting this many feet wrong at a rate this high.
pros: The bed was amazing. I liked the hot tub, even if the jet turned off after two minutes. The food was pretty good. The spa had great service.

title: Excellent in every way but room not as advertised.
cons: The room was too small. I find it difficult to believe it was 45 m as advertised by Booking.com.

title: An incredible stay at the heart of Madrid
cons: There was one dinner that was not very successful but the manager of the service made everything to compensate for that experience so we were fine in the end. In the spa, I would also welcome a sign at the spa pool to remind guests to shower before entering the pool. For hygienic reasons (and with increasing covid infection rates again), this would seem the normal thing to do. Surprisingly, all guests we saw jumped directly into the pool without showering. Hence, I would recommend the hotel to make efforts to remind people of this.  I gave the feedback already to the spa staff aswell.
pros: This is an exceptional hotel. We loved the location, the room, the spa, the overall ambience and the service. The staff really made an effort to listen to our requests and make us feel comfortable and enjoy the stay. Special thanks to the guest experience team for making my child so happy with the little gifts they had arranged based on my request. We will surely return.

title: Without any doubt, this is the best place to stay in Madrid.
cons: I can�t think of anything negative or anything needing improvement.
pros: A beautifully refurbished and renovated building in a perfect location.The rooms are very comfortable very nicely decorated and big enough for two people. Staff is super friendly and the service is immaculate. The courtesy car is also very helpful to help you get around. Top notch restaurant at the very top with beautiful views of the city - dont forget to book wells in advance!

pros:

Staff were highly professional.  The chat service (iPad) is your info gateway to anything you desire.  Great stay.

title: A bitter note after a great experience
cons: Unfortunately, the courtesy of the staff decreases sharply at the time of leaving the hotel. I had an unpleasant incident on the day I left, on the morning of January 3, 2022. I asked them to take my luggage from the room. After more than 10 minutes of waiting, I decided that apparently no one would show up and I took my suitcases to the reception. No one thought it necessary to even apologize to me and to regret that the bellboy had been obstructed, although there were none at that early hour.  This made a very unpleasant impression on me and gave a negative note to my otherwise magnificent stay.
pros:
- Magnificent, clean and spacious rooms

- Quiet and peaceful place, although in the heart of the city
